issue.title: [C++] [Documentation] add discussion of Union.typeIds to Layout.rst
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5933](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5933). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Union.typeIds is poorly documented and the corresponding property in UnionType is confusingly named type_codes. In particular, Layout.rst doesn't include an explanation of Union.typeIds and implies that an element of a union array's type_ids buffer is always the index of a child array.
